data.name: Tribe: Primitive Builder
data.detailed_description:
Check out our games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1263620/Yacht_Mechanic_Simulator/


About the Game




Do you think you have what it takes to live in a world without machines and the internet? Become an architect in the primitive times and help your tribe thrive and expand.




As the architect, the voice of the elders, your job in Tribe: Primitive Builder is to explore the island in search for everything that would help you and your tribe survive. Collect wood, stone, mud and even leaves. Use the environment to your advantage or perish like many civilizations before. Whatever you do, plan what to do next.




The island is your canvas. With the use of the resources you gather construct buildings that will provide shelter, food and work for your tribe. Upgrade your techniques and use advanced materials to create more durable and larger buildings.




Follow the guidance of the elders. Complete tasks, earn the tribe’s trust or face it’s wrath. If you are to lead the tribe then they need to trust you. Make sure their needs are not forgotten and they in return will help you with what they can.




As the architect you are only as strong as the tools you use. Create your own set of tools to use and conquer the wilds with them. Hammers, shovels, pickaxes and others will help you construct buildings while exploration gear will help you reach parts of the isle inaccessible before.




Grow your village. In Tribe: Primitive Builder you control how fast the tribe expands and you must take care of their needs. Expand too fast and find yourself starving, expand too slow and end up ill prepared for what is to come.

data.short_description: Do you think you have what it takes to live in a world without machines and the internet? Become an architect in primitive times and help your tribe thrive and expand.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Russian, Portuguese - Brazil, Turkish, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Portuguese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2100 / AMD Phenom II X4 955 BE
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 570 / Radeon HD 6970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 980 / AMD Radeon R9 Fury or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
